summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2202, for the improvement of East Howell Street from 13th Avenue to 18th Avenue; East Olive Street, from 13th Avenue to 15th Avenue, and 13th Avenue, from East Olive Street to East Howell Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon where necessary and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 22114 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
